alert.note: Alert for St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 3:54AM CDT until April 27 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL ST. LANDRY PARISH... At 354 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Port Barre, or 8 miles south of Palmetto, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Krotz Springs and Melville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
